name: How to please a Dragon
description:
Shovel for your life! The dragon loots like a pro and fills its cave. Steal trinkets to upgrade shovels and coin containers but be careful not to enrage the dragon!

How long will you last until you run out of space?

A Ludum Dare #42 Game.

GitHub: https://github.com/Kruemelkatze/HowToPleaseADragon
